Package com.example.project4

Class DonutController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4.DonutController
public class DonutController extends Object
This class contains methods that allow the user to add or remove the selected donuts to/from the ordering basket.
Author:
Steven Tan, David Fabian

  • Constructor Details

    • DonutController

      public DonutController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the necessary components (Comboboxes, List views) by setting the observable arrays for each. The yeast donut type is set as default in the selection.

    • changeDonutType

      protected void changeDonutType()
      Handles the Combobox that specifies the type of donut the user selected and updates the selection List view to display the flavors specific to that type of donut.

    • addDonut

      protected void addDonut()
      Adds the selected donut and flavor from the donut Combobox and List view to the order List view alongside with the selected quantity from the amount Combobox. Removes that flavor from the selection List view then updates the running subtotal and arraylist that keeps track of the currently selected items.

    • removeDonut

      protected void removeDonut()
      Removes the selected donut flavor from the order List view alongside with quantity. The flavor is then added back to the selection List view under the corresponding donut type. Updates the running subtotal and the arraylist that keeps track of the currently selected items.

    • addToOrder

      protected void addToOrder()
      Adds the most recent donut order(s) to the Order ArrayList after the user clicks on the "Add to Order" button. Notifies the user for not ordering donuts if the order list is empty.

    • findDonut

      private int findDonut(String flavor)
      Searches through the listOfDonutsOrdered ArrayList to determine whether a specific flavor of donut was ordered. If found, the index of the donut is returned. Else, -1 is returned.
      Parameters:
      flavor - String representing the flavor of donut for which to find.
      Returns:
      the index, as an int, of the donut in the listOfDonutsOrdered that contains the argument flavor.

    • setMainController

      protected void setMainController(StoreFrontController controller)
      Sets the main controller to the StoreFrontController
      Parameters:
      controller - StoreFrontController for which to set this instance's main controller reference to.
